newsitem.title: USA: Roberds sees Q4 earnings exceeding Q3.
newsitem.headline: Roberds sees Q4 earnings exceeding Q3.

text.p: Home furnishings retailer Roberds Inc said Friday it expects fourth quarter net earnings will exceed the $0.15 a share reported in the third quarter.
Roberds also expects to post "record" sales in the fourth quarter. The company was not immediately available to comment on its previous record sales volume.

In the quarter ended September 30, Roberds earned $885,000 or $0.15 a share on net sales of $94.5 million, compared with earnings of $2.1 million or $0.35 a share on net sales of $76.2 million a year ago.
